issue.title: [C++] Disable semantic interposition
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9813](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9813). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On gcc, semantic interposition is enabled by default. It can be beneficial to disable it when building Arrow libraries (and it's most certainly harmless anyway).

See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35745543/new-option-in-gcc-5-3-fno-semantic-interposition for more background on this.
